Articles.Content:
A simple part mod that adds a fuel refinery, well not really a refinery its just a generator that runs on electricity. I just wanted a way to refuel my reusable space craft on the ground for a quick turnaround.

Give it electricity and get Liquid Fuel, Oxidizer and, Mono. The fuel nozzle has a docking claw on it. Simply extend the arm and bump into it with your ship.

Your free to create any add-ons (Module Manager) to this you like to make it work with whatever resource mod you like.

Download

https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/535/FASA%20Refinery

Change log

1.1

* Split up the parts of the refinery to individual components.

* Now there is a Smoke Stack, Liquid/O2 Fuel tank, Mono tank, Fuel Arm (Grappler docker), and 2 concrete foundations.

* Non-stacked fuel tanks would need a fuel line to pass on fuel.

* Increased the power requirements by 5x

* Removed the LOX and LH2 text

Edited January 28, 2015 by frizzank
Very cool!
Really cool, kudos.
SAWEEET! id use it to simulate a Duna colonization where after 400 days they built it so that future landers can refuel there. What a cool idea for mod!

Very sweet , but i cant download

[h=1]Unauthorized[/h]The server could not verify that you are authorized to access the URL requested. You either supplied the wrong credentials (e.g. a bad password), or your browser doesn't understand how to supply the credentials required
Awesome! Now my spaceplanes get to be really reused!
I have the same problem with download as Nowater
I'm having the same problem as MrFancyPL and Nowater. The download link isn't working!
Interestingly even following the link from here leads to a seemingly private page
Fixed it and encase I did not there is a mirror download.
Awesome working fine now. Any chance of a smaller part consisting of just one of the tanks and none of the extra bits. A firespitter texture switch for different contents would be great too
yes I was thinking of adding individual componets to kind of have a build your own factory thing.

That is actually pretty cool. I'm not sure I would ever actually use it much in normal gameplay, but it is really cool. Maybe someone could make various airfields around the planet that a plane could land at and refuel?

Awesome working fine now. Any chance of a smaller part consisting of just one of the tanks and none of the extra bits. A firespitter texture switch for different contents would be great too

Any chance we could get a part that is JUST the fuel extending piece? The red arm- It would be invaluable if you want an adapible docking arm for ground tugs and such.

Oh, and if possible, could you make it radial-attachable? That way, we could set up multiple arms to connect to a single asteroid- it would be awesome.

Edited January 26, 2015 by Mekan1k
How much does this weigh and has anyone gotten it into orbit yet?
not my cup of tea, but a brilliant idea for those who DO wish to have this!
Frizzank can you make node behind refinery ???

I split up all the parts and made a smaller slab to place things on. I added attach nodes to the base if you want to use them.

Now you can create your own Kerbal dystopia.

* Split up the parts of the refinery to individual components.

* Now there is a Smoke Stack, Liquid/O2 Fuel tank, Mono tank, Fuel Arm (Grappler docker), and 2 concrete foundations.

* Non-stacked fuel tanks would need a fuel line to pass on fuel.

* Increased the power requirements by 5x

* Removed the LOX and LH2 text

Edited January 28, 2015 by frizzank

I split up all the parts and made a smaller slab to place things on. I added attach nodes to the base if you want to use them.

Now you can create your own Kerbal dystopia.
